author: Jeffrey Fiegenschuh
text:
Goodyear, AZ is working on an RFI (request for information) for an upcoming ERP project.  If your community produced an RFI for this type of project in the past, would you mind emailing me a copy?  It can be sent to jeff.fiegenschuh@goodyearaz.gov.  
Many Thanks!
Jeffrey A. Fiegenschuh, ICMA-CM
Deputy City Manager
Goodyear, AZ
title: ERP
